notes.tower: 这个数很大，我给不到数字的数量，需要用十的复幂。
notes.tower_mult: 有些数很大，我给不到数字的数量，需要用十的复幂。
notes.digits: That number is so large, that I can't even approximate it well, so I can only give you an approximation on the number of digits.
notes.digits_mult: Some of these are so large, that I can't even approximate them well, so I can only give you an approximation on the number of digits.
notes.approx: 这个数很大，我计算不到，需要用近似值。
notes.approx_mult: 有些数很大，我计算不到，需要用近似值。
notes.round: I can't calculate such a large factorial of decimals. So I had to round at some point.
notes.round_mult: I can't calculate that large factorials of decimals. So I had to round at some point.
notes.too_big: If I post the whole number, the comment would get too long. So I had to turn it into scientific notation.
notes.too_big_mult: If I post the whole numbers, the comment would get too long. So I had to turn them into scientific notation.
notes.remove: If I posted all numbers, the comment would get too long. So I had to remove some of them.
notes.tetration: That is so large, I can't even fit it in a comment with a power of 10 tower, so I'll have to use tetration!
notes.no_post: Sorry, but the reply text for all those numbers would be _really_ long, so I'd rather not even try posting lmao
notes.limit_hit: I have repeated myself enough, I won't do that calculation again.

format.order: {factorial} of {number} has on the order of {result} digits
format.all_that: All that of {number} has on the order of {result} digits
